instructions: Character sheet for [Macchiato Monsters](http://quenouille.com/macchiato-monsters-dungeonverse-build-together/), the Black and White Hack. Macchiato Monsters is a rules-light, old school, slightly collaborative roleplaying game. Brewing two hacks to get the perfect cup of DIY dungeonverse! Macchiato Monsters features simple roll-under resolution, omnipresent risk dice, streamlined combat, freeform characters, and no spell list.  [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Macchiato%20Monsters/ReadMe.md). v1.0 (2017-01-09).
